title: RegisterServices
description: This message allows a component to register its capabilities with a Discovery service.  If a component ID is specified in the JAUS Reference Architecture version 3.2+, it may report only one service beyond the core message support, and this service must be equal to the component ID.  If a component ID is not listed in the RA, it may report any number of services.  For example, a component with ID 33 must provide only service 33.   The exception to this rule is component ID 1 (the Node Manager) which may provide any number of services in addition to core message support. Note that this restriction may be removed in future versions of this Standard.

MessageID.comment: A two byte field to hold the message ID of a message

MajorVersionNumber.comment: Major version number of the service

MinorVersionNumber.comment: Minor version number of the service
